#load upper immediate for data memory base address
lui x2, 0xA0000000
#load dummy data to register
lui x30, 0x0DEAD000;
lui x31, 0x0AFFE000;
#store dummy data in data memory
sw x30, 0(x2);
sw x31, 4(x2);
#load two operands from memory
lw x3,0(x2)
lw x4,4(x2)
#add two operands
ADD x3, x3, x4
#store two operands in memory
sw x3, 8(x2)

Resultierender Maschienen Code
10100000000000000000000100110111		
00001101111010101101111100110111
00001010111111111110111110110111
00000001111000010010000000100011
00000001111100010010001000100011
00000000000000010010000110000011
00000000010000010010001000000011
00000000010000011000000110110011
00000000001100010010010000100011

A0000137
0DEADF37
0AFFEFB7
01E12023
01F12223
00012183
00412203
004181B3
00312423
